name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 15, Guangdong. A woman posted a video on Douyin about a customer stabbing a foot massage lady with a knife. She then received calls from three relevant departments asking her to delete the video. But she still didn’t delete it. A few minutes later, several police officers came to her house and asked her to delete the video. They also threatened her family and said that if the situation was serious, they would file a case for investigation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
A record of a meeting between Jiyue and the car owners was circulated online.
According to the publisher, many people in the car owner group have received calls from the police station and were asked to sign a guarantee.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, a man described the ridiculous experience of being beaten by the police after being forced into his house by five or six "cops" with guns just because he forwarded an article about a suicide incident.

Some netizens in the comment area also said they had the same experience: "The house was unfinished, and the group planned to defend their rights. That night, the group owner was invited to have tea."

"When the epidemic was over, I sent a message to the city government to ask for my salary in the group, and then the group disappeared, and the police called me."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Reported on December 16, Qingyang, Gansu. A teacher played mahjong with a friend ten years ago, and the rules were "Peace 5 yuan" and "Bomb 10 yuan" and was fined 500 yuan by the police.
In 2014, he played mahjong with a friend again and was fined 300 yuan. In 2023, the Education Bureau gave him a demerit for playing mahjong ten years ago.
Netizens replied "Why don't you investigate 500 years back?" "Civil servants play bigger, okay?" "Why don't you investigate the secretary and the principal, but a teacher?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: After the French government fell, Germany also fell. On December 16, German Chancellor Scholz's confidence vote was not passed in the Bundestag. Scholz could no longer stay in the position of Chancellor, the traffic light government was officially disintegrated, and Germany will hold early general elections. Currently, the new election of the German Bundestag is scheduled to be held on February 23, 2025.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: People's Daily Commentary: Deep-sea fishing is a violation of the rule of law, and the black hand behind illegal enforcement of deep-sea fishing regulations must be cut off.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, a fire broke out on Jianghan Road Pedestrian Street in Wuhan, Hubei. The fire truck was blocked outside and the firefighters walked into the fire scene. According to eyewitnesses, "The smoke started to rise around 12 noon. The community had evacuated the surrounding residents. As of 14:00, the fire had not been extinguished." The video circulated online showed that the fire truck was blocked outside the pedestrian street by the isolation stone pier, and the firefighters could only walk into the fire scene with their equipment. The accident caused 1 death

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
December 16th, Sichuan Zigong 3 people were arrested for soaking tripe in formaldehyde in a rental house
In order to process the tripe and ensure its "freshness", the three people thawed and cooked the tripe and soaked it in caustic soda, and added formaldehyde to preserve it when selling it. The three people sold tripe for more than 2 million yuan in total, and the tripe products involved had already flowed into the vegetable market for sale.
At present, the three people have been arrested by the police and transferred for prosecution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On December 16, the Peace Hotel in Shanghai launched a 298 yuan group purchase package, which was criticized for spending money to buy inferiority. 
Recently, a netizen posted a video to complain about the 298 yuan group purchase package launched by the Peace Hotel in Shanghai on a group purchase platform. The netizen said that the package actually includes a glass of water and a piece of bread, and it is not allowed to be eaten on site, and must be packed away. The group purchase shows that the original price of the package is 694, and the price is 298 after a 4.3% discount. 
The package includes a visit to the Peace Hotel Museum, lobby, restaurant and other public areas, which is worth 0.01 yuan; you can also choose one of the two projects worth 298 yuan: 
1. Jazz Tour: a cocktail and jazz appreciation; 
2. Food and leisure tour: a piece of cake and a cup of coffee to take away. 
The purchase interface shows that more than 50 people have purchased the package.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 16, the famous ocean-going cargo ship captain, Bilibili Up master Captain Seaman, posted a post complaining that his attempt to submit a video about installing and testing Starlink on an ocean-going cargo ship on Bilibili was blocked, with the reason being: "According to the Cybersecurity Law and other relevant laws, regulations and policies, this video will not be reviewed and approved." Captain Seaman's impression of Bilibili as open and fair was shattered

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 5th, Hanzhong, Shaanxi A blogger posted a video accusing the traffic police of setting up cones and checking for highway violations. There were many tire marks of sudden braking in front of the cones. The blogger questioned that this method of highway interception was dangerous and violated the Road Traffic Law, and was suspected of abusing his power. After the video was released, the Shaanxi traffic police went to Hefei to find the blogger, saying that the fine could be negotiated, and asked the blogger to provide two adult ID cards. They changed the speeding to not wearing a seat belt, and no points were deducted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16, Guangzhou. An ambulance was blocked at an intersection by illegally parked vehicles and sanitation vehicles. Even as the ambulance kept honking, the workers on the garbage truck remained indifferent and continued to process the garbage cans at a leisurely pace.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Because so many people asked what happened in Yuxi, the Yuxi radio station closed the comment section.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Since the situation in Yuxi was strictly blocked, netizens could only vaguely express what happened in Yuxi:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: December 16 Shenzhen Due to the landslide on December 5, residents of Jiuwei Community in Bao'an District had to take a detour of more than two hours to travel a 20-minute route. They finally began issuing access permits to residents yesterday, allowing them to travel by electric bike with the permit. Because there were too many people who needed permits, many people waited in line until the evening to get the permits, and the queues lasted more than two or three hours.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On December 8, the originator of the term "malicious wage demand" and NPC deputy Li Baozhong was included in the list of dishonest executors! The total amount of money executed was only 480,000 yuan.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Doing life-threatening work and getting the cheapest salary
Some netizens discovered that Guan Tianfeng, a hacker who was offered a $10 million bounty by the United States, had a labor dispute with Sichuan Wusheng Information Technology Co., Ltd. in July 2020. Guan Tianfeng sued Wusheng Information Company and then voluntarily withdrew the lawsuit. The court ruled that Guan Tianfeng should bear the litigation fee of 5 yuan.
